short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a Chrome extension that allows developers using server-side rendering frameworks with React to pinpoint and debug hydrationâ€¦

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a Chrome extension that allows developers using server-side rendering frameworks with React to pinpoint and debug hydration errors. We create a tree visualizer and error report to help developers find problems with hydration. There's also a performance analyzer, powered by Lighthouse, that enables developers to track their app's improvements in performance as they debug.
